website_summaries.verdict: You can't blame these capris if you can't do the splits.
pros: True capri length for most women
Fabric softens the more you wash it, unlike other pants that seem to shrink and get tighter
Inside pocket at waistband is large enough for big phone
True to size for most women
cons: A few complaints about see-through fabric

customer_reviews.title: Peek-a-boo!
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like these capris...they are high waisted, hold everything in, and are a nice, stretchy material - perfect for spin class or yoga. But there is one massive problem...I did the "bend over" test, and they are see through! I suppose, if you wanted to be *that* person, they may work for you...but, I'd rather keep my personal matters to myself...
customer_reviews.author: illy*23

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel, I love that they are high waisted. The reason for the 1 star review is because they are completely see through! I'm a size 16 ordered xl and they fit really well. Just can't wear outside my house.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica DiBene

customer_reviews.title: Yay! Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I weigh 260 and purchased them in watermelon. I was a little worried that they might be really revealing, but they are just perfect!!!!!!!!! Love them! Will definitely be purchasing more and highly recommend them! Super comfy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I am muscular built and so my thighs are huge and these are GREAT for that
customer_reviews.text: I am OBSESSED with these pants... I am muscular built and so my thighs are huge and these are GREAT for that.. They aren't see through and they don't slide down.. I wish they had more colors because I have most of them! Do not hesitate to buy these I am 5'3" and 165 pounds with thick thighs and mediums fit PERFECT (when normally I would wear a large)
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Perfection.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best leggings I have ever bought. The rise is perfect, they stay in place better than any other leggings I have ever worn. I have a very aggressive exercise routine, and clothing has a tendency to shift, but these are amazing. I am 6 feet tall and 170 pounds, female, XL fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Julie F

customer_reviews.title: This is nothing what I ordered before. First two ...
customer_reviews.text: This is nothing what I ordered before. First two pants were 90 degrees by reflex and I ordered two more. Waited almost a month and received wrong items. I am so upset. They get no stars from me but I had to select one in order to submit this review. I don't know how this happened
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Definitely ordering more!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size down because alot of the reviews said to. I'm 5'1", 130lbs, 28" waist with 38" hip and the xs fit perfectly, their squat proof and hit me around my navel. When I order a lighter colour I will buy a small just to be safe but for the darker colours I'm going with xs. These leggings are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Seetahal

customer_reviews.title: Better than the rest!
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are the best I have ever owned. I am a dance teacher and I own legging everywhere from target to lululemon. But these take the gold! The waist never rolls down and the material just comfortably hugs you to where you feel pulled in but not squeezed. I give these leggings my highest recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these is “rubine red” in a size small. I am 5’3”, 135lb, 26” waist. They fit perfectly! The high waist comes up just a little over my belly button, which is just where I like it. The color is just what I was looking for. It’s a bright, watermelon red/pink. My friends said these passed the squat test (not see-through) at the gym today:). I love the material of these leggings. It’s a thick, cottony type of spandex, rather than the shiny, satiny kind. I first found this brand at TJ MAXX and I’ve been hooked ever since. I love that I can get them on Amazon! I will definitely be getting more colors :)
customer_reviews.author: dguzi

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE! They are so comfy and soft
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE! They are so comfy and soft! I bought three pair. Two pair high waisted (tummy control) in colors black and moonlight and one regular pair in the color tayo yam. All size small. I'm 5'2" 135 pounds and they fit perfect. I honestly love them just as much as I love Lululemon. The price makes me love them more! They are so affordable and worth every penny. Can't wait to order more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with these!!! Comparable to old navy elevate leggings but even better! Does not squish you and has amazing stretch without the gross polyester feel. Reference I am 5’3 160lb and medium is perfect for. Comes right at my belly button. It says Capri but it’s a bit longer on me which I don’t mind. Gonna be buying a ton of these because the quality is awesome for the price!!!! New fav!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine King

customer_reviews.title: In between sizes: size up
customer_reviews.text: I am in between sizes for pants, I'm either a medium or large, so I got the dark blue in a size large and the watermelon in a medium. The large was the way to go because although the pink pair fit, it's less comfy than the dark blue pair. The blue pair also feels thicker in fabric to me. So if you are between sizes I personally would recommend that you go up a size. I have worked out in both pairs and they worked perfectly. I've gotten hella compliments on the pink ("watermelon") pair, and a lot of people ask me where I got them. They're super bright tho.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Wow wow wow!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how well these leggings fit me! I have a big booty, athletic thighs and some cellulite. I have a hard time finding leggings that are flattering and thick enough to wear as pants- but these are perfect! I have a very hard time deciding which size to order and I don’t typically trust sizing charts- but I can say this chart is exactly true to size. I ordered the medium despite usually wearing large. It’s perfect for me. I ordered the cropped legging hoping with my height (5’3”) it would be right above my ankle. It’s almost perfect. I think I made the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Thin and not flattering
customer_reviews.text: I’m in the process of returning. They are thin enough to see my underwear when I did a squat in the mirror. I also thought they’d have more ‘compression’ to them..like smooth you out and hold you in all the way around but they don’t at all. Also the seam inside the legs rub together and are rough..like they were sewn cheaply. It’s sad bc I read in an article that supposedly these were supposed to compare to Lululemon leggings-but I sure do hope that Lululemon leggings don’t feel and look this awful at their price! Will not be buying again and very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kjeanm84

customer_reviews.title: NOT Lululemons dupes. Sheer and don’t pass squat test!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these leggings after several influences I follow preached that they were Lululemons dupes. Although they are thick the quality falls short. They did not pass the squat test, even after sizing up (I’m 5’4, 125 lbs and ordered a small), they are not soft like Lululemons and remind me of the first batch of the name brand that was totally see through. Although they may be good for running errands, I wouldn’t wear them to a workout class, lift weight in them, or even stretch in them (and def no yoga) unless you want everyone seeing your goods. Major bummer considering the number of positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: NMM

customer_reviews.title: Best workout pants ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Size XL. I wear a 16-18 maybe a size 20 on a bad day. I have very long legs and a long torso plus a post babies tummy. Finding workout pants that are flattering and stay in place during a workout for my size isn't always easy. These pants are beautiful and I love that they come up above my waist so I don't have to worry about pulling my pants up in the middle of working out. I can't wait to buy every color. BTW The material is thick enough so your underwear don't show!
customer_reviews.author: Cdubb

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these leggings! They fit as expected, I like the high waist and they were super soft/comfortable. However, I wore them for the first time today. I took my pup on a 3 mile run, and dropped him off before heading to the gym only to look down and realize the seam had completely busted open near my vagina and my red thong was showing for the world to see. Thank god I realized it before I got out of my car. I have never had to write a review on a product before, but I would advise anyone not to buy these leggings. They didn't even last 1 day. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Similar to Athleta’s Chaturanga Capri
customer_reviews.text: I have only worn these a few times but do enjoy them. I’m 5 ft 2, a medium in Athleta’s or a size 8 in jeans. I got these in a medium and they fit great. They fit like 7/8th so they are a little longer. The material is just like Athleta’s Chaturanga Capri, which is more of a cotton feel. I was hoping for something more like the Salutation or Lululemons Align, but these are still nice. 90 degrees does make a pair that are smoother and have a “buttery softness” which are the yogalicious ultra soft capris, but those are a bit thin. Overall I do like them.
customer_reviews.author: L. James

customer_reviews.title: Not see through!! Get them!!
customer_reviews.text: After a distaster of see through Nike leggings that I spent a fortune on, I googled the best NON see through Leggings and these popped up. Took me straight to the sight and I purchased. So glad I did. After several opinions in different lightings, I’ve gotten the ok from everyone that these are indeed NOT see through. Ladies- get them!! I’m a standard 12. Sometimes 14 (covid vibes) but I got the large and they’re perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Overshiner

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor quality. Scratchy and sheer
customer_reviews.text: This brand appears to have a real problem with quality control. The reviews for these leggings are off the charts but I’ve ordered their black leggings from 2 different listings and they’re so low in quality they’re unwearable. The leggings I received were both scratchy, cheap feeling, and completely see through. I didn’t even have to squat to see they were sheer. I’m not sure what leggings all the other reviewers are receiving to leave such glowing reviews.
customer_reviews.author: RazorSkillz

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these leggings
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these leggings! They are high quality and are very similar to leggings that are much more expensive. I would seriously buy more if they restocked some of the colors in my size that I was really wanting to buy. I read reviews about sizing down and I would agree. The size I would typically buy for leggings was too big and when I went a size smaller they were the perfect fit. Colors left to right: Vintage Indigo, Gothic Fuscia, Stone Grey, Black, Napa Purple, Tayo Yam, Tuscan Teal, Fig Sugar
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I ordered navy, size medium (5'3", 157lbs- curvy/athletic/new mom) overall for the price there good work out leggings. My only complaint is I wish the material was a little bit thicker, and the "high waistline " had a little bit more hold you in. (Had a baby year ago).
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Lulu
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because all the reviews RAVED that these were as good as/better than Lulus. They definitely aren’t, but they aren’t horrible either. I was hoping they’d feel like the luon wunder unders, but they don’t. They’re like half the thickness of Lulus, and I’d say they have like 10% of the compression. They’re not see through, you can’t see your bare ass through them, but they do show panty lines if you wear a thong under them. But the color is nice and if I saw someone else wearing them I would think that they were Lulus. I definitely wouldn’t buy more, but they’re good enough for lounging around the house or running errands.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, not the same as before
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pair of leggings because they are supposed to be the same as a previous pair I'd gotten. The fabric is ENTIRELY different from what it used to be. This is NOT the type of fabric that leggings should be made from; it's cheap, transparent stuff. It's nothing like the thicker, durable, opaque fabric they used to be made from. I'm tired of clothing brands changing items drastically but calling it the same item as before. Don't bother purchasing these unless they change them back.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these at 6 weeks postpartum!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE these pants. I am 6 weeks postpartum. I am 5'5" and went from 130 to 220 pounds (palm in face lol). Before pregnancy, a medium was perfect. Now, at 6 weeks postpartum and 189 pounds, the large fits well. It is a little tight, but i like it to squeeze me up. It is not so tight that its uncomfortable. It has just the perfect amount of tightness to suck in and hide the baby pooch that I still have. They are also thick and not see through, which is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great leggings!
customer_reviews.text: Love these leggings. Squat proof... And I squat A LOT.. Tight, soft. Great length and very flattering. Definitely a great pair of leggings!! I am SUPER picky about the fit of my leggings, I also have a long torso as well as tall and curvy and just about bought every damn pair of leggings on Amazon to find the right ones and these are definitely some I'm keeping. I also purchased the interlock ones by 90 degrees and love them as well. I'm 5"9 185lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Most people talk about how this looks on them or whatever it is. I want to talk about the durability in these! I just ran a spartan race, and for those of you who don’t know, it’s very rigorous. I climbed walls, rolled on the ground with rocks and mud, fell a couple times. I was afraid these where going to be totaled, however I gave them a good wash and they are like brand new! I ordered and xl and I wear a pants size 13/15. These are my go too workout pants! Covers the belly and never falls down when I run!
customer_reviews.author: Kendrah

customer_reviews.title: Really slimming.
customer_reviews.text: At first when I took them out of the bag I thought no way are these gonna fit but since the reviews said otherwise I gave them a try and they fit! I’m 5’1” 180# and have been buying XL in my workout pants. In these I listened to the reviews and ordered a Lrg. I have a belly but they fit good and really hold everything in! They are Very Well made! I haven’t worn them yet but expect they’ll be comfortable during workouts. I’ll update later on. I may buy more although I wish they were shorter like right below the knee.
customer_reviews.author: FIGHTING MBC

customer_reviews.title: MY FAV LEGGINGS
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6" // 110 lbs and size SMALL fits me perfectly for reference. I originally found this brand at Marshalls and every time I buy a pair they become my holy grail leggings. When I found these online for so cheap I was thrilled. I can definitely say I'm done buying expensive brands like Nike and Lulu because the quality of these are the same AND yes they're squat proof 100%. The fabric is awesome. 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Berry

customer_reviews.title: Fabric pilling on inner thigh area
customer_reviews.text: I love the compression of these leggings, however after wearing occassionally for 2 months I have noticed the inner thigh area is pilling. I have liked how these pants fit and I like the capri length, I just wish the fabric held up better to use. I purchased a large size during my last 2 months of pregnancy. I am 5' 6" and weighed around 160lbs. The pants still fit me (now 130lbs) but I don't like the pilling from the fabric rubbing together.
customer_reviews.author: Modern Southern Mother

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color sent.
customer_reviews.text: I was sent the wrong color. I ordered the color on the left but was sent the color on the right. The problem is that the tag also has the wrong color listed so I have no idea how to order the color that I want now. The blue moon leggings have the wrong color name on the tag. Otherwise, these are comfy. They do seem to run a little big. I am 5’8”, 149 lbs, with a semi athletic/curvy build. They’re a little loose in the waist. I’m going to reorder a different color in a size small to see how they fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D.

customer_reviews.title: See Through !
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a size large but reading the reviews, most people suggested to size down. So I bought a size medium and they fit good. The material was nice and comfy however my biggest issue with them is that they are completely see through. Even when I am standing still you can see completely through them. Its as though Im not even wearing pants at all. They're in no way shape or form, appropriate for ANY occasion. I couldn't even wear them while lounging around the house. It is a shame because I heard great things about them but sadly I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because the yoga leggings fit me so well. I thought it would be the same fit with these since they are the same brand.. I was so wrong. These capris were too tight in the pelvic area (crotch), were somewhat see through in the butt, even worse when I bend or wear normal seamless underwear. The material is completely different, with a cheaper feel. They're manufactured in China, while the normal full length leggins are made in Indonesia. I'm unsure if these are fake or if they are becoming cheap with their clothing processes but Im extremely disappointed and will not be ordering them again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Jecevicus

customer_reviews.title: Buying more!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I love high- waisted yoga pants that have something like a control top for my lower belly. These pants are high quality and dare I say, comparable to the quality of Lululemon! The material is not quite as thick as Lulu but, that actually makes them cooler for working out yet does not comoromise the tight and secure fit I like.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Russell

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: always buy zella but figured i'd try these capris. fit well, not too long (im 5'3'' and wanted capris not ankle length). i got a small as my zella large were too big, and just starting getting a medium in those. these are great value, havent worn much because ny weather is still freezing but love the fit and think they will be my new go to pants for the gym and pt.will reorder again, and hope to get the longer ones for next winter.
customer_reviews.author: bettyanne nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: Very soft material like brushed cotton. Love these leggings! For reference I am 5'0 135lbs. This goes pass my ankles because I am short
customer_reviews.author: Kbeta

customer_reviews.title: Colors may not be true!
customer_reviews.text: Love 90 Degree capris, however, the last two colors I purchased look nothing like advertised. I am attaching photos to note the difference. Pretty disappointed in the colors. Honey Rose and Cloudburst Blue are actually quite pale in comparison to the bright, dark and vibrant colors that show for purchase. They are more of a light blue and light pink.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very itchy material
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the color. That’s about all I liked. The fabric was very itchy and the stitching was off. Not smooth and soft like I like my leggings. These were not shiny or matte... idk how to describe them. Felt cheap. Looked cheap. Just not soft and I am a true medium and they fit very tight. I did not like these at all! I like the yogalicious and I thought that these were the same brand but sadly nope. I will not repurchase or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Annie k

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I searched for a while before buying these and still was a little worried since the reviews were a bit scattered. However, I got them super fast, and when I opened the package and tried them on? Oh honey... These capris fit and feel amazing! They also passed the bend and squat tests. Of course I haven’t worn or laundered them yet, but they feel durable, not chincy and thin. My only complaint so far is that I wish there were other color options available in my size!
customer_reviews.author: Book binge

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect! but can see sweat
customer_reviews.text: I got the bright blue, which are such a cute color and look just like the photo. I went on a 30 minute run in them and unfortunately there was sweat visible in the crotch area. They fit nicely, but I did hear a slight rip of a seam when I pulled them on - used to being able to stretch my Lululemon tights every which way without thinking about them lol, so maybe that's on me! I'm 5'7 and 145lbs and the Small is great on me! I really like the length of these. They aren't too cropped and fall between the calf and the ankle which is a really flattering length in my opinon!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas N. Burdett

customer_reviews.title: Great pants overall
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’3, 157 lbs. These pants are the length I wanted—on me, a few inches above the ankle. I believe the XL would have been a better fit, as the waist is too tight. However, I am losing weight and knew to go with the L or risk having them become too large in the coming months. I can still wear them comfortably - just snug in the waist. And no rolling down. Nice fabric, medium thickness, not overly shiny, and lots of compression. They do have a small pocket inside the waistband, but I really would have loved an outer-thigh pocket for my phone/keys. Great pants overall!
customer_reviews.author: avdrdr

customer_reviews.title: Great quality leggings without breaking my pocket!
customer_reviews.text: Don't think twice! I just tried it today at the gym/leg day.These leggings are amazing! Great quality, very stretchy, not see trough at all I bought seagreen color in xs, I'm 5.5 120# and it fits like a glove!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these pants!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these pants! I have lots of other pants by 90Degree and their quality is incredibly awesome! I wear these for running, walking, circuit training, PiYo, HipHop...you name it. I love the soft material and the hidden pocket but most of all the high waist! Would definitely recommend this product AND buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Benita R. Cloward

customer_reviews.title: Love these leggings
customer_reviews.text: I love these leggings!!! I picked up a pair a while back from Marshals and was so surprised by how soft they were and was pleasantly surprised when I found them on amazon. I ordered them in the magenta color as well. I got a size small (5’4, 145lbs with hips and a booty). The ones I got from marshals are a medium and While they fit, I find myself pulling them up at the gym a lot so when I ordered them on here I sized down. They are a tiny bit tight but not uncomfortable. So so soft and comfortable and great colors!! I will be ordering more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: They changed fabric
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased, I believe, at least 10 pairs of 90 degree leggings. I used to love them. They were my go-to leggings. I wear these everyday! I’m a baby belly having, plus size (size 16), mom and need comfort to chase after my toddler. I also need COMPRESSION, but what I need the most is the original fabric they used! It was thicker. Less soft, and had more construction (better at hiding cellulite!). Don’t get me wrong. These are good leggings, but the reason I bought them originally was because they used a more restrictive fabric. Since they no longer use that, they are, well, just another pair of leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Danskin since way back in the day. They were an exclusive maker of clothing for dancers and their competitor was capezio. My favorite from them were the tights with the seam in the back of legs. They’ve always made sturdy well-made products. Now they have reinvented themselves and make exercise clothing. These Tummy compression pants are the best I’ve ever used. They don’t lose their shape when you wash them and they are comfortable and elegant. But, I returned them because I found the same pants for a cheaper price at TJ Max. But these pants are the way to go; but I must say I don’t like the yoga ones with the smaller waist band.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia A.

customer_reviews.title: Sucks you in in the right places!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I got this in an XL thinking they would fit super snug & would be good when I lost a bit of weight but they fit just right! I can probably get away with a Large now. I wear a size 14 in jeans if that helps with sizing. These also fit above my belly button which I love! These are also a few inches above my ankle for a nice length! I will definitely buy more & in regular length leggings! Oh & the pocket is Eh, I would have to lift my shirt to access it & that’s not happening!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B

customer_reviews.title: Started off great!
customer_reviews.text: Expectations were high because of the price. I really love both the fabric and fit of these right from the start. They are a very soft matte fabric. They do not roll, and stay where you put them. However, a month in, they look like they’re 5 years old. Fabric is pulling and some of the seams are starting to fray. The search continues for perfect yoga pants!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Pysh

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these capris to wear with a Loc and Love sleeveless top while traveling thru airports and on airplanes. I felt very comfortable the whole time I was in them, and neither piece looked well worn once we got to our different destinations. I usually wear an 18/20, 5'9", 240lbs, so I bought these in a size XXL. They didn't roll down from the top, I didn't have to keep pulling the leg openings down, and no grotta. Plus the stretch held my tummy in and my butt from doing the jig. I'm very satisfied with these leggings, and I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Zaftig227

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I like these, will probably order more. I’m 5’2” and have a short torso so these are very high waisted on me but wasn’t a problem. Stayed put through 3mile jog and leg day afterwards. A little sweat showing on this color (get a dark color if that bothers you) I’m 130-135# and 40” in hips small fits great, not too tight. Good, thick tights! Hoping they last 👍🏼 Photos show color inside and in sunshine- mulberry
customer_reviews.author: CSR

customer_reviews.title: Wildly Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered three pairs of these pants. The first pair was great. Thick material, held up well; they rolled a bit at the top but that could be a sizing issue. The second pair I ordered to wear after my pregnancy about a year later. They were the same thickness but for some reason they stretched out much faster. After a couple of hours wearing them they were baggy in the crotch. The third pair? Thin. You can see through the pants. They don't stretch out and get baggy though so I guess there's that. I wish I could actually get what I got the first time because those were great.
customer_reviews.author: sma393

customer_reviews.title: 0 stars
customer_reviews.text: I love love love love these. I want all the colors!! Edit: I tried them on, without in depth inspection. Put them on today and noticed a hole in the crotch were the material missed being gathered by the threading in the seam. Very disappointed, I've purchased a handful of these leggings in the past without issue. I'll need to replace these from anither company. Kinda dont want to chance it, for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Kh

customer_reviews.title: I love these leggings!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these leggings in the capri and long lenths for three years and they are the best fitting, most comfortable and most flattering leggings I have ever worn. I live in them all week for hiking, volunteering, going out (under tunics, etc) and they hold up. The pocket is the right size for an iPhone SE... if you have a bigger phone, you will need another way to carry it. They don't pill and the waist band is perfect for someone who is somewhat flexible in size from time to time. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Farr

customer_reviews.title: Great for postpartum
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these!! I searched & searched for something I could wear postpartum without breaking the bank. These worked perfect for me! These fit so well right over my after baby tummy without leaving me uncomfortable. They shaped my lower half nicely and gave me confidence to wear other tops as well. Right now I am 3 weeks postpartum and living in the 3 pairs of these I have purchased. I was a Size Large before baby and purchased an XL for postpartum, they fit perfectly on me and I could squeeze into a large if I wanted them to be a little tighter.
customer_reviews.author: MRS

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly and don’t fall or roll down.
customer_reviews.text: So I waited to do this review after wearingthese legging to the gym and again after I had washed them. I also did Olympic weight lifting, yoga and cardio in these leggings, including lots of squats. I am sold of them and I am going to buy several different colors. I am pretty picky about leggings. They have to stay up when I am jumping rope and lifting weights. These stay in place perfectly and don’t roll down. They are also very soft and feel compressing but not uncomfortably tight. Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Fear

customer_reviews.title: These are THE BEST workout leggings ever
customer_reviews.text: These are THE BEST workout leggings ever! They’re so stretchy but hold everything in (I had a baby over a year ago and still working on my midsection and weight loss). Not see through either. I got the black and eclipse but sent the eclipse color back because even though it said they were the correct size, they felt more stiff and not as forgiving, so I returned them for another black pair. I will definitely be buying more! I am 5’1” and about 158# and a Large fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: ELMA16Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered 3 pairs of these leggings over the last year, but I'm sad to say that the last pair I bought were not the same quality as the other two. Its been less than a month since I received the newest pair and the labels are already wearing off. The fabric seems to feel different than my other pairs, and they are SO SEE-THROUGH. I can't wear them to the gym or out in public as you can see my entire butt! I used to love these leggings and I recommended them to almost everyone I know. Please please please go back to the way they were previously made!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: You NEED these! Buy them in every color!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST LEGGINGS EVER! I have just purchased 3 more pairs. One pair is a gift for a friend! UPDATE: I have just bought yet another pair of these! I’ve decided that I can’t wear any other leggings to the gym ever again! I tried to “splurge” and I bought an expensive pair from a famous fitness brand. Needless to say I HATED them because thy did not compare to these. I will never wear another brand! 90 Degree 4life lol! 🏋️‍♀️💪🏻🏃🏼‍♀️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Mrs_Fit_TJR

customer_reviews.title: Run HUGE and not high waisted
customer_reviews.text: Im 5’4 and 125 lbs . These are clearly designed and sized for heavy people - not normal sizing at all !!! First ordered a small which is my Usual size and they were HUGE ! Literally gaping around my waist and not tight enough on the leg ... and I have muscular legs . Fit like a medium easily and possibly a large in some yoga pants brands . Then I ordered an XS and they were still not as tight as my normal pants . Also ... These are regular rise - hit at belly button on me . Fabric is just average . Color was pretty but that’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: flexiest

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I really love these. I haven’t bought the lulu lemon aligns bc I cans seem to buy for that much money. So, I can’t compare them to these. These are pretty soft, come up to my belly button, and are a good 7/8 length. I am 5”2 about 125lbs with some belly fat. I bought a small in lapis blue and mulberry. Both are pretty but the mulberry is so gorgeous. These really make the glutes look good. I’m happy with my purchase. I’ll update this review if there is a problem after washing. I’m hopeful though!
customer_reviews.author: Jp100

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail Leggings!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several legging brands from Amazon and these 90 Degree by Reflex High Waist Leggings are the best! They are thick enough to offer that feeling of support and compression, and the fit is super sexy and flattering. I weigh 115 lbs but I’m also in my 40’s so I appreciate a legging that offers a little lift in the rear and flattening at the tummy, and these do. I ended up ordering 2 more. I got extra small and they’re a perfect fit, even after washing. Get these, you’ll be glad you did!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fantastic buy! high quality and VERY flattering!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I wear them all the time. The fabric is very thick and definitely squat proof. It’s got a good stretch to it and it has some compression as well. These are super flattering and make my waist look really little and they are great at shaping your booty! For reference, I’m 5ft, 128lbs, have a size 2 waist (27inches) and a size 6 bum. I ordered a size small. It’s hard to find bottoms that are flattering but these are awesome! They don’t have that shiny athletic material so you can wear these casually with any top. I’d definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Anita V.

customer_reviews.title: Everything about the lavender leggings are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE the fit on these leggings. I’m super picky about the compression, fabric, length, and these are perfect. They are very soft, not super tight compression but tight enough to stay put and not roll down. They sit high enough on waist to hide muffin top or fupa front (lol) but not way above the belly button where it feels ridiculous. I love them. Loved them so much that I bought them in the black color, but for some reason the black didn’t Have the same soft feel or fit.... don’t understand that, but the lavender ones are amazing. I’m 5’1” 128lbs and bought a small (normally wear a 4-6 pants)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I love these pants
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I love these pants! I now have 4 pair, and will be buying more. I've got several brands, from Nike to Under Armour, and these are just as good for a fraction of the price. Now, if they just made these with fancy patterns I'd have a drawer full of 90 Degree workout pants. They are squat proof, meaning that skin doesn't show through when you squat. They look good, feel good, and I love the higher waist. It helps hold the belly I'm trying to work off in, and I don't have to pull my pants up after every move I do. Don't ever quit making these pants!
customer_reviews.author: R. Brand

customer_reviews.title: Perfect workout capris, squat-proof
customer_reviews.text: Bulletproof, trustworthy solid black material with good stretch and compression - NO SHOW through even while squatting. I'm tall and muscular (5'9", 165 lbs) and size medium is perfect. The waist is comfortable and holds my tummy supportively - which is something I need after four children.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite legging!
customer_reviews.text: These legging are by far the best I’ve worn. They wick away sweat and keep your skin cool, while offering just the right amount of compression-without looking shiny. I have several pair of both the capri length and ankle length. EDIT** After washing the last pair of leggings (which I always do before wearing), several stitches have come out and unraveled. I’m disappointed, and fear they won’t last like the many other pair that I already own. The quality control let this pair slip through. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Keeks Mann

customer_reviews.title: Great Leggings! Watch the color you pick!
customer_reviews.text: First, I would like to say these are my favorite leggings. They fit well, are comfortable, breathable, and they do not fall or roll down when running, squatting, or anything else. The only advice is to watch the color. I had a dark purple pair and got the two pack with black and what I thought would be a kind of "pepto bismal pink" to get a better deal per legging. The pink is a lot lighter / less vibrant than the image. When I wear them it makes it look like I am not wearing anything on the bottom. They are still great leggings, so that color has just become my indoor workout set.
customer_reviews.author: Cara B

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!!! I NEED EVERY COLOR!!!
customer_reviews.text: These pants are great! The fit is awesome! High rise squat proof and stretchy! The only complaint would be that the bottom of the legs is a little looser than I like, but that's personal preference. I say order true to size I did and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Leggings.... but XS is not small enough
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, substantial leggings. The quality is very good, and I would buy more of these were it not for one thing: the smallest size available is XS and this is not small enough for me. I was hopeful that the sizing would be comparable to the SPANX XS sizing, but this is not so. If you are XS/XXS & are expecting a super form-fitting situation, these will not deliver. I would call these more of a US size 2 as opposed to a 0/00. I wish they made a smaller size! That said, if you are a 2 or greater in size, I would recommend these leggings without hesitation because they are very soft, thick and cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Luxe156

customer_reviews.title: So pretty but DON'T LAST
customer_reviews.text: Look, when I first got these about a month and a half ago I LOVED how comfortable they were so much that I literally bought five more pairs in different colors. However, after only about three washes later, two of the pairs have a giant rip in the same spot of the crotch. I would typically blame myself if these were super tight and I did Rockette routines in them but they fit perfectly with a little bit of room to spare and I do typical body weight workouts, so nothing crazy. Are they comfy? Absolutely. Do they look flattering? Definitely. Are they durable? NO.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: not all colors are the same!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 pairs of these in Fig Sugar, Maritime Navy, and Eden Green. The materials of all 3 are slightly different, but all are squat-proof and fit well. Eden Green is definitely the most buttery soft, and Fig Sugar is the least soft (although this color is STUNNING so its worth it). I am 5'5" 120 lbs and ordered an XS (I typically wear a size 25/26 in jeans). I would say if you aren't super happy with them - try another color! There are definitely colors that are major winners.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga pants!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really surprised by these yoga pants, even though I read through many of the very thorough reviews (with photos). I did size down as was recommended by nearly all reviewers, and they fit, but I will probably order one size up in the future just to see how they compare. The compression is really nice, the crotch is a U-seam so no camel toe (hallelujah), and the fabric is quite thick. For reference, I am 5'2", 138 lbs, shaped like a potato (not athletic in any way shape or form, it's all fat, my friends) and I ordered a Medium (they aren't Capri length on me but rather ankle length). I'll definitely be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: AsianaGrande1

customer_reviews.title: Nope not working for me
customer_reviews.text: If you fuse women's textured dress pants with high compression athletic pants you would birth these awful things. The fabric is abhorrent on my skin, they are NOT squat proof, not even bend over a bit proof. I can see underwear that is the same color as the pants. I can see butt cheek. Maybe if you enjoy feeling squeezed to death and itchy and never need to bend over you can wear these. Also I am 5'4" and these are not cropped on me at all. I'm not returning them because they make it a pain in the ass to do so. I will be giving them to my taller sister who enjoys being uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Color way off!!
customer_reviews.text: Honey rose picture looks magenta pink. In person it's a very pale flesh color pink. Not even close to the same!!! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Emma LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: In love!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with these high waisted capris. They're made of quality material that is flattering and and comfy. They "hold you in", in all the right places without being too tight. I ordered a medium, I'm 5'7" and around 145lbs. Fit great. Being a few months postpartum I love how the high waist hides my little pooch without giving me a muffin top. I feel very confident wearing these. I mostly just lounge in them/ roll around the floor with my baby, but they could easily be dressed up and wore with a longer dressy shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Brynn

customer_reviews.title: I read somewhere these were the best tights ever and I was like
customer_reviews.text: I read somewhere these were the best tights ever and I was like, "Yeah, whatever." But they ARE, like, the best tights ever. Seriously, they aren't shiny. They hold you in where they are supposed to. They aren't so tight that you can't get them on or off without injury. They don't cut off your blood supply at your calf or belly. They are incredibly soft. From what I can tell, they are thick enough to hide my cellulite from the rest of the world and I've had them for a few months, washed them a gazillion times, and they haven't faded or worn a bit. And they were what, twenty bucks or something like that? The best. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: Brookshire Legace

customer_reviews.title: Great basic black leggings
customer_reviews.text: Reviews were spot on. These are made well from substantial fabric that seems like it will hold up well and won't stretch out. Also, they come high enough up to suit me. Great pants for the price, and they arrived quickly. All that said, I am usually a size 6-8 in pants and the small are just slightly on the small side. I will most certainly order more of this brand, but will order M next time for optimal comfort.
customer_reviews.author: CAMomof3

customer_reviews.title: Fit is great. Colors are off.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these leggings and have several pair from this brand BUT just assume the colors won’t be exactly like the colors pictured. I bought green leggings and was all excited to actually find this color from my fav legging brand but alas I returned them bc what came was more like charcoal gray and I am wanting green specifically and have plenty of gray leggings. Attached is a picture of the “green” leggings I ordered next to a pair of gray leggings from the same company. Too close to call them any shade of green.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit! High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’4, 155lbs and the medium fits perfectly. I’m so impressed with these leggings! I have a large booty and legs but a small waist so finding leggings that fit is so hard. These fit so nicely at the waist and my legs don’t look like they’re squished in. They are squat proof too! The only thing I don’t like about them is that’s they’re hot! I wish there was some mesh paneling or laser cutting because the thick fabric is hot and I live in Texas lol.
customer_reviews.author: CanadianInTexas

customer_reviews.title: Quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality. Cannot see through these. They are a bit tight which keeps everything in place but if you want to wear them all day to be comfy, size up. They're fine to work out in or to go walking in the morning before a shower but I won't be loungin in these unless I get lucky and lose a size. As for Shine - I wasn't sure what that was. I am not crazy about it. It's more of a poly instead of a cotton knit. It's okay. I'm keeping it but I won't buy it again just because it's not my thing but depending on your use and taste, it could be right up your alley.
customer_reviews.author: Glutenfreeisme

customer_reviews.title: Best bargain leggings
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my fifth pair of leggings from 90° by reflex. I absolutely love them. The fabric is just a little bit thick and compressive, definitely squat proof even in the lighter colors. Stay up beautifully. I have worn a few pair out, but that is over the course of probably three years and once a week wearing, which for that price is pretty damn good. definitely a Lululemon and Athleta fan, and these are amazing bargain leggings that stay in my weekly rotation. 5’7” and 170 lbs - I actually got a medium for compression and they work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Larsen

customer_reviews.title: So sweat stains
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like these pants. The material is very soft and I like that it’s not to thin so it helps hide cellulite( keep in mind it’s a dark color which also helps) the major issue is they show sweat rings which is a problem. They are great to wear if you're not planning on doing a major workout that involves sweating but if you do any kind of activity lookout. As far as size I ordered a medium. I’m 5’5 and 145lbs and pear shape. The medium fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, comfy, fair ratio qulittle/price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the size small in mango flame, usually a size small (3-4), and they fit great! They do stretch quite so it would still be ok for a size up I feel. Material is good, I doesn't not do well in the dryer though so u let it sit dry, I could see the inseam breaking apart a little bit since it's thick it should not make a hole. I also feel the material/color "attracts" stains but it does wash away good. Pretty comfy, love the color, I might order another bright color. Not my favorite to do sweaty workout but great to lounge and look good!
customer_reviews.author: jannet9

customer_reviews.title: Great Pants for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for simple black capri pants for the gym. I prefer a high rise to hold in the mommy tummy and definitely got that! They are snug, but do not cut in too much. They stay up through all weight lifting and cardio workouts no problem. Only reason I'm giving 4 stars is that they are completely see-thru in the bum when you squat. I wear nude thongs, so not a huge issue, but still annoying to have to worry about. I have Fabletics that are 4x this price that are see-thru as well so these really are a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: JessWing

customer_reviews.title: Not for short people!
customer_reviews.text: If you are under 5’0”, do not buy these! These came all the way down to my ankles and were very wide at the bottom. Was an awkward fit. I can sometime buy capris/crops and they fit me okay, but these didn’t even look okay. If you are petite and need affordable leggings, buy them online from old navy! They have petite sizes that actually fit!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke M.

customer_reviews.title: love the fit, BUT they are SEE THROUGH
customer_reviews.text: wanted to love it and keep it, but the two of the three colors I ordered were see through when I did some squats. Magenta, and the lavender color. Black was not see through, or at least not as bad as the colored ones! I read so many reviews before purchasing these and everyone said they were squat proof. NOPE. The fit was perfect. I am 5'9" and 155lbs for ref and they fit great. but nope, not when I bent over or did squats. I wanted these for the gym, the reason I am looking for leggings. So if you are just looking to lounge around and not bend over ever, then get these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to Size
customer_reviews.text: I love these leggings! I have them in lapis blue, black, moon mist, and magenta, and I want to buy more as they come back in my size. For reference, I am a size 4-6 in most jeans/pants (probably more a 6 now), and the Small fits perfectly. I ordered some in an XS just to see if I could make them work because they didn't have those colors in a Small, and while I could get them on, they didn't look or feel as good as the Small. Please restock all the bright colors in a Small!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: I love these pants!
customer_reviews.text: I just got these pants in yesterday, and so far I love them. I'm on the plus side of sizing (about a size 14), and I ordered the XL. They fit great, they come up high enough to cover my muffin top, and they don't roll down when I move or sit. I love that I don't have to keep hiking these pants up every few minutes, because they stay in place. No wedgie either! They are not see through, at all, and they are also very comfortable. I also love that there's a little pocket in the waist band. These are just really cute, comfy, pants. I ordered 2 more pair in different colors. I recommend buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Kim D.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material, no tummy control
customer_reviews.text: These just fit weird, and they really don't provide good tummy control. I just had a baby and ordered these to help hold in my post baby tummy, but there's just not enough compression where you need it. It's VERY tight at the waistband and cuts in, but then the actual tummy part does nothing to hold you in. They fit fine, just don't provide any compression which is why I bought them. It's just a cheap pair of leggings, nothing special about them. I'm really disappointed because of the great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: a.rose

customer_reviews.title: Love them ! Great fit super stretchy
customer_reviews.text: I am 5ft 1 215 pounds and an XL fit perfectly. They can either be full length down past my ankl(they are a little lose at the ankle as you can see) or I can hike up the leg a bit have them be 7/8 as shown. I wish they tighter around the ankle so I could wear them as full length leggings without the loss fit around the ankle. They feel more like cotton than that slippery under armor type of fabric that most athletic wear has. I like this cotton type of fabric feel better.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and slimming
customer_reviews.text: Would definitely recommend these for shorter runs or gym workouts. They have a hidden pocket for your key or cards, provide a slimming affect through the mid-section and are quite comfortable to wear during workouts. I have other pants by this brand and can attest to how durable they are. However, I prefer a more slick/dry-fit type pant for endurance runs.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Otero

customer_reviews.title: Two pair, same color & size- different fit?
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these- exact same size and seller, about a week apart. They are totally different. The first pair was great, doesn’t stretch, keeps it’s shape and fits amazing. The second pair is a totally different material, was not anywhere near as slimming as the first pair and totally stretched out. I’m not sure how that happened? But they just are not the same. Makes me question the quality and whether these are truly 90 degree brand
customer_reviews.author: JHT

customer_reviews.title: I bought a pair previously and I loved them, however this pair is thinner
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair previously and I loved them, however this pair is thinner, fits differently and has already started pilling in the thighs (worn twice). This pair is made in China and the first was in Vietnam. I can't believe the difference in quality. I wish there was a way to tell when ordering where the product is from. Disappointed in this pair, but I'm going to try one more pair in hopes I get another awesome pair like my first. 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: DawnMarie

customer_reviews.title: Size down for greater compression
customer_reviews.text: All the positive reviews are true! Get these!! I ordered three pairs- one in size medium and two Smalls. I am returning the medium for Smalls. I am 5'6, 145 pounds with wide hips, flat butt, and a diastasis recti pooch after three kids. I LOVE the compression of the high waist that sucks in my belly. The fabric is super soft. They wash well. They look great on! I love the lightening blue color. That's about as crazy as I will go as far as colors go but they are super fun and bright. Definitely comparable to Way higher priced athletic leggings! Don't hesitate!!
customer_reviews.author: KellyP

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy.....
customer_reviews.text: I’m a short girl, 5 feet, and these yoga pants are a good fit, I got a small, length hits right at my ankles, if I’m bending down then they come up a little above my ankle, the waist is above my belly button, it holds me just right not too tight or loose, if I get an xsmall they probably would fit a little snatched but I’m happy with a small for now, will definitely buy more when they are available, a lot of colors aren’t available right now in small.
customer_reviews.author: JOAN

customer_reviews.title: quality control issues? quality down hill?
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these as I have them in another color and those are perfect. Such a disappointment. I ordered a size large (same as my grey ones) and these do not stay up- even when just lounging or running errands, they slide down. that was problem #1. These also rub and pill between the thighs much more than the grey pair, problem #2. And, after 4-5 washes and no machine drying, there are threads coming out/seams unraveling at the left leg opening and left hip too, three strikes and you are out!
customer_reviews.author: Alina Bricklin-Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: Hate loose falling leggings all day??? Look no more! These are for you!!! They don't fall, they don't over stretch throughout the day, they have extreme tummy control and come up very high for comfort!!!! Such a thick and well made material. You won't regret buying these. I am 5'2 and weigh 190, size 12/14 and ordered the large. They were perfect!!! I already have more saved in my cart to order again soon!!!! MUST BUY
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Ovitt

customer_reviews.title: Old navy offers better compression
customer_reviews.text: I read an article stating these pants were comparable to LuLulemon, so I thought I’d give them a try. They stated they were high waisted compression capris. I found them to be extremely comfortable, and stayed in place while running, however did not offer compression at all. I prefer old navy actives compression to these. Also the seam at the legs was already unraveling after one wear. In short, if you prefer more compression do not order these, if you like extremely flattering comfy leggings, these are your best bet!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Thick girls BEWARE.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5, 162 lbs. I ordered a large in the magenta color. I'm a full-time student and wear leggings to school everyday. The leggings have no compression, so cellulite and stomach pouch will be on display. The leggings are high-waisted as described, but they gave me camel toe. That may be attributed to the fact I ordered a large hoping the leggings wouldn't be see-through. Unfourtunately, even with the leggings fitting me big, they are still see-through. I will not re-order a smaller size. I need a legging with some compression.
customer_reviews.author: denise_santi_simmons

customer_reviews.title: Better order large or xtra lrg if you weigh 120# or more. Sizing way off.
customer_reviews.text: Used the size chart which suggested a small. Wanted to make sure of the fit so ordered med. Still fit too tight at the waist. Why are the size charts off? Are they American charts? This has happened several times with other sellers also. Will not be purchasing anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty girl

product_meta.title: 90 Degree By Reflex – High Waist Tummy Control Shapewear – Power Flex Capri
feature_bullets: POWER FLEX FABRIC. The exquisite construction and high durability of these 22” capri leggings are unrivaled. The 87% Nylon 13% Spandex/88% Nylon 12% Spandex, Heathered Colors: 44% Nylon 43% Polyester 13% Spandex fabric was developed to endure everyday wear and machine washings to last for years. Consumers love these high waisted capris for everything from workouts at the gym to lounging around the house.

ELASTIC HIGH WAISTBAND. Our Power Flex Capris have a high 4 ½“ waistband for better tummy control. These capris offer an elastic waistband and provide light compression to your midsection. Our high rise workout capris are a popular women’s style for their excellent fit and soft comfort. Compare your hip, waist and inseam measurements with our size guide to help you determine the perfect size for you! Approximate model size (S).

PREMIER DURABILITY. Among the many benefits of these workout capris, you’ll discover that the high waist promotes both compression and support, while the streamlined fit will make you feel strong and confident to take on whatever the day brings. In addition, a gusseted crotch helps maximize free movement while interlock seams minimize rubbing and chafing. Plus, with a hidden pocket in the waistband, you’ll be able to stash your gear safely and go wallet free!

RELIABLE, WELL-LOVED BRAND. 90 Degree by Reflex is a lifestyle brand that combines style, comfort, fit, and performance. The high quality activewear is both affordable and accessible, perfect for fitness enthusiasts and everyday athleisure. Rest assured that you will receive a quality product from Amazon’s #1 seller of athletic leggings and other athleisure products. Consumers love our products and reviews speak for themselves. Get on board with the brand that men and women are raving about!

30-DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. 90 Degree by Reflex’s products are sold with a 30-day, full-money-back warranty and can be returned no questions asked. Add this item to your cart by clicking the "Add-to-Cart" button and buy it now. We run out of inventory quickly, so order now while colors and styles last.
